price: Dia mengetahui (pandangan) mata yang khianat 1319 dan apa yang disembunyikan oleh hati.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ
footnotes: 1319.  Maksud "pandangan mata yang khianat" ialah pandangan yang terlarang, seperti memandang kepada wanita yang bukan muhrimnya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu khāinata al-aʿyuni wamā tukh'fī al-ṣudūru
